name: Mirror’s Edge Companion
description:
Read on for important info below!

Fight Oppression, Claim your freedom!
Whether you are at home or on the move, the Mirror’s Edge™ Companion app keeps you connected to the world of Mirror’s Edge Catalyst and the City of Glass.
Featuring a 3D map of the City of Glass, the companion lets you see where you and your friends are in the world, track your progress in Mirror’s Edge Catalyst and facilitate social play against other runners.

• Fully rendered 3D map of the City of Glass
• Track your game data:
o Game progression
o Social playground
o Player profile
• Learn more about the world of Mirror’s Edge Catalyst with Intel & lore database
• Follow your friends and other players to stay informed of their activity
• Manage your User Generated Content:
o Create your own challenges
o Access other players content
• Customize your experience:
o Unlock new Runner Tag elements via in game achievements and trials
o Create your own unique Runner tag
• Bookmark your favorite content

For More Details, visit www.mirrorsedge.com

Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement; requires Mirror’s Edge Catalyst for PC, PS4 or Xbox One and an EA Account to play – must meet minimum age requirements, which vary by territory, to obtain account.

User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Visit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.

By installing this game, you consent to its installation and the installation of any game updates or upgrades released through your platform. You can turn off automatic updates through your device settings, but if you do not update your app, you may experience reduced functionality.

Some updates and upgrades may change the way we record usage data and metrics, or change data stored on your device. Any changes will always be consistent with EA’s Privacy and Cookie Policy, available at privacy.ea.com.
